name: Splice Crisis 2
description:
Splice Crisis 2 is an arena shooter where you'll be able to take control of a variety of characters with different weapon loadouts and abilities. Try out two of them in this alpha demo.

Deploy to the mission area and clear out as many enemies as you can in the time you have.  Extend your mission time with different abilities and long combo streaks.

Utilise the aim mechanic to score headshots

Use your melee ability to crowd control

Earn extra score and time bonuses for finishing an enemy with your melee abiltiy

When things get a little busy, crack out your secondary weapon

Combine your skills to maximise that combo

The game is best played with a dual analog stick controller.  Keyboard and mouse controls are implemented.  Button remapping will be coming in a later update
